text:
Role: Integrity Business Connections (2009–2011)
Jof Davies upgraded the organisation’s CRM system, improving efficiency across telemarketing and client reporting workflows. He created an Access-based internal reporting system, replacing Excel-based processes with reliable, query-driven output. Responsibilities included data import, cleansing, deduplication, and creating daily reporting structures.

This role strengthened capabilities in data modelling, Excel automation, VBA programming, and designing structured systems that align sales activity with operational needs. Jof demonstrated the ability to translate raw business requirements into dependable technical solutions.
